title: Had reflux, it reached the back of my mouth, I swallowed it, is my fast valid #Assim assim al hakeem
transcript: uh during it was during the Ramadan while fasting one day acid reflex came to my throat and I deliberately swallowed it I felt that the The Reflex liquid little bit crossed and reached at the back of my mouth it did not fully come to my mouth but just a little bit at the back of my mouth so is my fasting valid it happened to me twice yes your fasting is valid inshallah
